infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save photos.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your contacts to help you connect with friends.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow LifeList to access your camera

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow LifeList to access your contacts.
